-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: Game		|
Platform.............: Windows   	|
Crack................: Included	 	|
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sid Meier's Civilization II, a.k.a. Civ II, is a turn-based strategy computer 
game designed by Brian Reynolds, Douglas Caspian-Kaufman and Jeff Briggs. 
Although it is a sequel to Sid Meier's Civilization, neither Sid Meier nor 
Bruce Shelley were involved in its development. Civilization II was first 
released in 1996 for the PC and later ported to the Sony PlayStation.

In 2002 Atari re-released the game for newer operating systems, such as Windows 
Me and Windows XP. The Multiplayer Gold Edition was included in the Civilization
Chronicles box set released in 2006. Civilization II: Multiplayer Gold Edition, 
besides possessing multiplayer functionality also includes every Civilization II 
expansion and many additional scenareos.

This is a new Release of Civilization II: Multiplayer Gold Edition. While the 
original release and many other releases did contain all the necessary files for 
a clean install of Civilization II: Multiplayer Gold Edition, they were flawed 
by a critical Vista installation and playability problems, stability issues, 
audio-video problems, and poor documentation. By converting the content to a 
portable format, providing working cracks and better documentation, and including 
the Official and Unofficial  patches, these issues have been resolved. It is 
note worthy that this release is the "full" release in contrast to the "thin"
release, and as such it has had all audio and video files included regardless of
necessity.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              Miscellaneous Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please Note The Following:

.I.
The Federation takes no responsibility for any damage that may come to your 
computer through the trial of this game. This mod has been tested to work 
on Windows XP and Vista. No support or technical assistance will be provided. 
Ever. Creation of this release took many hours of unpaid labour. 
.II.
The Federation recycled an unlisted crack for this game as Civilization II: 
Multiplayer Gold Edition requires a knowledge of archaic cracking which predates 
all Federation members. 
.V.
I am ZKZ. 
I am an INDEPENDENT member of the FEDERATION group. 
Props to the scene.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Install Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Steps:

(1.) Extract the "Civilization II - Multiplayer Gold Edition.rar" file to a 
directory of your choice and then Navigate to the extracted directory (by 
default this is the "Civilization II - Multiplayer Gold Edition" directory). 

(2.) Double-click of the "CIVILIZATION II - SCENARIOS PATCH.EXE" if scenareo
functionality is desired. Double-click on the "CIVILIZATION II - MULTIPLAYER 
GOLD EDITION" binary/executable.

Note: This release is portable and therefore the binaries/executables within 
make no changes to the game/system files which are already updated, modded, 
and cracked.

Note: The official manuals, and covers are located in the ".EXTRAS" directory.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                  In The Pipeline
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
T-BOX - ZKZ of the Federation Team

Games - Pending
EMUs  - Complete
NFO   - Pending
Test  - Complete

This release is imminent. This project seeks to combine a Lite (less than 700m)
Vista build, bootscreen, frontend, registry tweaks, several related 
applications, twenty-plus emulators and tens of thousands of various game 
images and roms in an orderly package. This package would then allow a user 
to easily create a SF personal computer (or any other light PC) that would 
act as any console from the first to sixth generation. This has been a huge
undertaking but if it is successful this project will provide the PC scene with 
the first real replacement for consoles. Please understand that projects like 
this one can have unsuspected kinks. Please be patient.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
			    Scene Requests/Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(1.) False Postive - The users anti-virus client may detect this programs as a 
Virus or Trojan. This false positive is caused by the binary wrapped scripts   
(UPX) which are utilized as launchers for the games. As these files create hidden 
functionality they appear as threatening to most overzealous virus scanners such
as eSafe. Detailed scans have/will indicate that this release neither accesses key system files or the internet. There is no way for these files to harm your computer.
